channel.title: Today in Insanity: Jack Thompson Blames Bill Gates for VT Shooting
channel.description:
http://gizmodo.com/gadgets/home-entertainment/today-in-insanity-jack-thompson-blames-bill-gates-for-vt-shooting-253797.php The thing that makes me even sadder about this article is that it highlights how truly uninformed Jack Thompson is.
Bill Gates, responsible for Counter-Strike? Marketing? MS != Valve. Bill Gates != Gabe Newell. Hell, Gabe Newell != Counter-Strike, it was a mod team that created it, later hired by Valve.
Ohpleasepleaseplease say Bill sues him for this one. The resources of the world's richest man in a libel suit against the world's stupidest. Classic drama in the making.
[EPIC WIN DETAIL:] Note the news article linked at the bottom of that one, NO GAMES FOUND IN CHO SEUNG-HUI'S ROOM. http://gaygamer.net/2007/04/warrant_reveals_no_games_in_ch.html Eat it, Jack.

item.title: Today in Insanity: Jack Thompson Blames Bill Gates for VT Shooting
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

He’s a little more then misinformed.

If it wasn’t games then it’d be a movie’s fault. If it wasn’t a movie’s fault, it’d be some musician’s fault. And if it wasn’t a musician’s fault, it’d be the parent’s fault. When are people going to see that the person is responsible for his or her actions?
It’s not like they’re talking about a 6yr old boy shooting is 4yr old sister. If that was the case, then yeah, it would be someone else’s fault. But this was a college student.

Read full topic
item.source: Today in Insanity: Jack Thompson Blames Bill Gates for VT Shooting

item.title: Today in Insanity: Jack Thompson Blames Bill Gates for VT Shooting
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

Gizmodo

Today in Insanity: Jack Thompson Blames Bill Gates for VT Shooting

Not content in just blaming video games and video game creators, Jack Thompson's now blaming Bill Gates for what happened at Virginia Tech. An exerpt:


The thing that makes me even sadder about this article is that it highlights how truly uninformed Jack Thompson is.

Bill Gates, responsible for Counter-Strike? Marketing? MS != Valve. Bill Gates != Gabe Newell. Hell, Gabe Newell != Counter-Strike, it was a mod team that created it, later hired by Valve.

Ohpleasepleaseplease say Bill sues him for this one. The resources of the world’s richest man in a libel suit against the world’s stupidest. Classic drama in the making.

[EPIC WIN DETAIL:] Note the news article linked at the bottom of that one, NO GAMES FOUND IN CHO SEUNG-HUI’S ROOM.
http://gaygamer.net/2007/04/warrant_reveals_no_games_in_ch.html
Eat it, Jack.

Read full topic
item.source: Today in Insanity: Jack Thompson Blames Bill Gates for VT Shooting
